titleStmt.title: SII 8.43: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 43. (A.R. No. 455 of 1902). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE NATARAJA TEMPLE AT CHIDAMBARAM, CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī koppaeruñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu muppattāṟāvatu siṁhanāyaṟṟut tiyati Oṉpatiṉāl taṉiyūr perumpaṟṟappuliyūr mulapparuṣaiyār Eḻuttu . nammur nilakkaṇakku taṉmappiriyaṉum tillaimuvāyiraveḷāṉum kaṇṭu nammura melpiṭākai kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻap periḷamaināṭṭu Acceric cāttaṅkuṭiyāṉa mayilpālakulakālanallūrppāl śrī cuntaracoḻavatikku meṟku coḻakulacuntaravāykkālukku teṟkku
6 3catirattu Etirilicoḻaṉ tirunantavaṉattu Ellaikku meṟkkuppaṭṭa nilattu kulottuṅkacoḻaṉ tiruttoppukku maṇkoṇṭa kuḻiyāy taramiliyāy mārāyar kūttappirāṉār Uḷḷuṭṭār peril māppeṟu peṟṟa nilamāy Ivarkaḷpakkal muṉṉāḷil mutaliyār tirumañcaṇamaḻakiyār vilai koṇṭu tāmaraioṭaiyāy Ivar puṉpayiṟc ceytu Aṉupavittuvarukiṟa kuḷam tukuttu mutaliyār tiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyār tillaināyakaccaru
ppetimaṅkalam Eṉṉum tirunāmattāl vaiytta Akarattu brāmaṇar nāyakar tirutter Eḻuntaruḷumpotu tiruppuṟakkuṭaiyile Adhyayaṉam paṇṇi sevittum tirunāḷkaḷilum tiruvvasantaṉ tirunāḷilum kulottuṅkacoḻaṉ tiruttoppilil Eḻuntaruḷiṉāl svasti colli sevittum tirumañcaṉakālattu Adhyayaṉam paṇṇi sevittum Etirilicoḻaṉ tirunantavaṉattu piḷḷaiyār civapātacekaraṉ cittattuṇaipperumāḷ Uṟsava
ṅkaḷukku tiruppālivalat tirunāḷkkaḷukku Eḻuntaruḷiṉāl mṛTgrahaṇam paṇṇiAruḷumpotu svasti colliyum cevittuppotukiṟa Akarattu brāmaṇar palakaṭṭaḷaikaḷilum palarpakkal dāṉamākavum vilaiyākavum koṇṭu Aṉupavikkiṟa 9 1/2 . Iṉnilam Oṉpataraiyum Ampalanāyakapperunteruvil tirunāvukkaracutevaṉ tirumaṭattu nāyaṉār Aḻakiyatiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyār kiḻaittiruvācal mukakaṭṭaṇattu EḻuntaruḷiIruntu pūjaikoṇṭaruḷukiṟa kulottuṅkacoḻaviṉāya
kappiḷḷaiyārai rājākkaḷtampirāṉ tiruvītināyakar tiruppavaṉi Eḻuntaruḷumpotu tirukkaṇ cāttiyaruḷum nāḷkkaḷukku tirumuṉpu cevikkum tirukkāṭccikaḷukkum tiruppaṇṇikārattukkum viṭṭa 1/2 Iṉnilam Araiyum Āka 10 li . Iṉnilam patiṟṟu veliyum Iṉnāḷmutal muṉpu Uṭaiyār Aḻakiyatiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyār tirunāmattukkāṇikku nāṅkaḷ muṉpu Eḻutikkuṭutta vivastaippaṭiye Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyārkku tirutter maṭakku viḻukkāṭṭile tirutter Eḻuntaruḷivikkavum koyiṟku kuṭimai Uḷḷiṭṭa sabhāviniyokamum maṟṟum ceṉṉir Amaiñci Uḷḷiṭṭa tevaikaḷum
veḷḷāṉ veṭṭiyum Uṭpaṭa Epperpaṭṭaṉavum tavirntu Ūrkkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyāka Utakam paṇṇikkuṭukkaiyil Iṉnilattukku vantaṉa Ūrile Eṟṟi Iṟukkavum Iṉnilaṅkaḷ Oḻukum maṭakkum piṟakkum Iṭattu tillaināyakaccaruppetimaṅkalattu Adhyayaṉa paṭṭarkaḷperil tillaimuvāyiraviḷākam Eṉṉum perāle Eḻutakkaṭavarkaḷākavum . Ippaṭikku tirumāḷikaiyile kal veṭṭikkoḷḷakkaṭavarkaḷākavum kaṭavatākavum coṉṉom . Ippaṭi ceyyappaṇṇuka . Ivai Aruḷāl Ūrkkaṇakku Eṭuttapoṟpātappiriyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku mulaparuṣaiyār Eḻuttiṭṭa niyokam tirukkaikoṭṭiyil Oṭukki kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.43 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
